bibl.title: The Greek Minor Prophets Scroll from Nahal Hever (8HevXIIgr) (The Seiyâl Collection I), with the collaboration of R.A. KRAFT and a contribution by P.J. PARSONS. (Discoveries in the Judaean Desert. VIII.)
